com.snapscreen.sdk

Class SnapscreenKit

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.snapscreen.sdk.SnapscreenKit

  • public class SnapscreenKit
extends java.lang.Object
    Initialize and store SnapscreenClient for accessing REST API.

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public static SnapscreenKit init(android.content.Context context,
                                 java.lang.String clientId,
                                 java.lang.String clientSecret,
                                 boolean testEnvironment,
                                 SnapscreenKitListener snapscreenKitListener)
        Entry point to initialize Snapscreen SDK
        Parameters:
        context - the Android application context
        clientId - should be provided by Snapscreen
        clientSecret - should be provided by Snapscreen
        testEnvironment - whether to use the test or production environment for SnapscreenKit
        snapscreenKitListener - listener for receiving important status callbacks - may be null
        Returns:
        initialized @{link SnapscreenKit}
